WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this! The issue has been fixed and can be tried out in the upcoming 0.9.5 release. We also have a beta available (https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta) if you'd like to try it out.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I have noticed a glitch when showing compile errors.

If the TS file is not open in VS, the error won't show in the Error List, but only in the output.

How to reproduce:

1. Create new empty web project
2. Add a .ts file with "foo" only in the content and close it
3. Build
WorkItem.Summary: ErrorList window won't show compile errors
